name: 10 Second Shuriken (itch)
description:
10 Second Shuriken is a fps platformer. Speed run and master levels within 10 seconds destroying all the enemies to get the fastest time.

Features
  • A game where you only have 10 seconds to beat the level
  • Jump and shoot your way through 40 levels taking you from grasslands, to laser and ice worlds.
  • Collect and use power ups like teleportation shurikens and jet packs to help you destroy your enemies
  • A feeling of satisfaction when you kill all the enemies so fast that you get a 3 star rating
  • Dodge Lasers, jump on trampolines, and destroy odd shaped enemies
